title: ğŸ› ï¸ 0.0.1a Update Info
description:
Welcome to PLAY3 â€” your friendly, mission-powered gateway to Web3.
PLAY3 is created to bridge the gap between Web2 and Web3, fostering a new kind of community and ushering in a user-driven era.
Our mission is to introduce a wide range of Web3 experiences and outstanding DApps that were once difficult to access, empowering everyone to become a key player in the Web3 world.
With the launch of our Beta service, PLAY3 is taking its first step forward â€” and today, weâ€™re happy to share our very first update.

[ Key Updates ]
ğŸ”§ Bazaar Update
â¦ The Bazaar lifespan is now set to 12 hours to keep trades active and ensure equal opportunities for all users.
ğŸ‰ Lucky Fountain Update

â¦ Now that itâ€™s more accessible, everyone can join in and enjoy the thrill.
ğŸ”§ Weâ€™ve also resolved several known issues.

ğŸ“„ Release Notes
PLAY3 will continue to grow with your support. We welcome your ideas, feedback, and suggestions at any time!
Weâ€™re in this together.
Thank you always. â€” From the PLAY3 Team
[ Release Notes ] v0.0.1a (2025.07.11)
1. Feature Updates & Changes)
â¦ Chat
â¦ World Chat cooldown has been adjusted. (1 minute â†’ 5 seconds)
â¦ Bazaar
âˆ˜ Bazaar duration is now limited. (No limit â†’ 12 hours)

â€» With the update, any previously opened Bazaars will be automatically closed.
â¦ Lucky Fountain
âˆ˜ The max for Lucky Fountain has been changed. (Now capped at 2,000 Copper)
âˆ˜ Each click now contributes 1 Copper, with a 0.5-second interval between clicks.
âˆ˜ The latest winner and the amount of Copper won are now displayed.
2. New & Updated Content
â¦ New NPCs Added
âˆ˜ Event Fren: Say hi in the Main Square, provides guides for events and notices.
âˆ˜ Bazaar King: Say hi in the East Fleamarket, explains how to use the Bazaar.
â¦ Welcome our new NPCs
âˆ˜ Lumber's Daughter: Now in place of â€˜Forest Linâ€™ in the Main Square, sheâ€™ll happily show you how to collect Copper!
âˆ˜ Bazaar Queen: Now in place of â€˜â€˜Market Krisâ€™ in the Main Square, sheâ€™ll provide Bazaar usage guidance.
âˆ˜ Lumber Jack: Updated appearance and now gives tips on how to earn Copper.
â¦ New Mission
âˆ˜ A new daily mission, â€˜Close your Bazaarâ€™, has been added.
3. Bug Fixes
â¦ Fixed an issue where missions wouldnâ€™t refresh if the date changed during an active session.
4. Known Issues
